name: Greeble
description:
You're a lowly space mining bot who suffers a terrible accident and is separated from your crew. Find enough fuel and body components to repair yourself and explore.

1st Place winner in the desktop category for JS13k 2017.

This is game is very rough and the playable content is short and incomplete. There are rooms that don't connect and the world wrap will leave you lost.  I ran out of time and space for play-testing and content.  So you've been warned, and I already know about these issues. ;)
